title: Mountain Surrender
description: Sometimes a girl just has to get away.When Sara Evans picked up her life and moved to Cody, she never expected an encounter with confirmed bachelor Zachary Glass would interfere with her plans of a quiet small town life. He was everything she could want in a man. Attractive, polite, dominant. Only Sara’s past holds her back from giving herself to Zachary.Zachary didn’t date local women until Sara breezed into his life. Breaking his own rules for a single night out with the new girl in town, Zachary finds himself caught in a trap of his own making. Sweetly submissive, Sara draws him like no other, providing a challenge the dominant in him cannot refuse.
author: Mae Shields
